```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}

mydata <- readRDS('')

compiled1 %>%
  filter(year == 2015) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = month, y = permit)) + 
  geom_bar(stat = 'identity')
```

```{r}
compiled1 %>%
  filter(year == 2015) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = log(permit + 1), y = log(n_incidents + 1))) +
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(method = 'lm', se = F, col = 'black')
```
